{{cpp/experimental/reflect/title|FunctionParameter}}
{{cpp/experimental/reflect/navbar}}
{{ddcl | since=reflection_ts | header=experimental/reflect | 1=
template&lt; class T &gt;
concept FunctionParameter = Typed&lt;T&gt; &amp;&amp; ScopeMember&lt;T&gt; &amp;&amp; /* see below */;
}}

The {{tt|FunctionParameter}} concept is satisfied if and only if {{tt|T}} reflects a function parameter (Note: A {{tt|FunctionParameter}} does not satisfy {{tt|Variable}}, and thus does not offer an interface for getting the pointer to a parameter).
